languages.text: Сестры Ордена Единственной звезды, основанного другой соратницей Лорд-капитана — Арджентой, — часто упоминали имя Идиры в проповедях как пример грешницы, сумевшей обратиться к свету.
The sisters of the Order of the One Star, founded by Argenta, another companion of the Lord Captain, often mentioned Idira in their sermons as an example of a transgressor who found the light.
languages.original_text: Сестры Ордена Единственной звезды, основанного другой соратницей Лорд-капитана — Арджентой, — часто упоминали имя Идиры в проповедях как пример грешницы, сумевшей обратиться к свету.

traits.locale_text: Sisters of the Order of the One Star, which was founded by another comrade of the Lord Captain, Argenta, often mentioned Idira in their sermons as an example of a sinner who found it in herself to turn to the light.

Sisters of the Order of the One Star, which was founded by another comrade of the Lord Captain, Argenta, often mentioned Idira in their sermons as an example of a sinner who found it in herself to turn to the light.
Sisters of the Order of the One Star, founded by Argenta, another companion of the Lord Captain, often mentioned Idira in their sermons as an example of a transgressor who found the light.

The sisters of the Order of the One Star, founded by Argenta, another companion of the Lord Captain, often mentioned Idira in their sermons as an example of a transgressor who found the light.

languages.text: 领主舰长的另一位同伴阿洁塔修女建立了“命运之星”修会，修会的修女们经常在布道中提到伊迪拉，将她视为罪人弃暗投明的典范。
languages.original_text: The sisters of the Order of the One Star, founded by Argenta, another companion of the Lord Captain, often mentioned Idira in their sermons as an example of a transgressor who found the light.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长的另一位同伴阿洁塔修女建立了“命运之星”修会，修会的修女们经常在布道中提到伊迪拉，将她视为罪人弃暗投明的典范。

languages.text: Schwestern des Ordens des Einen Sterns — von Argenta gegründet, einer weiteren Gefährtin des Lord Captains — erwähnten Idira oft in ihren Predigten als Beispiel einer Sünderin, die das Licht gefunden hatte.
languages.original_text: The sisters of the Order of the One Star, founded by Argenta, another companion of the Lord Captain, often mentioned Idira in their sermons as an example of a transgressor who found the light.

traits.locale_text: Schwestern des Ordens des Einen Sterns — von einer Argenta gegründet, einer weiteren Gefährtin des Lord Captains — erwähnten Idira oft in ihren Predigten als Beispiel einer Sünderin, die das Licht gefunden hatte.

languages.text: Les sœurs de l'Ordre de l'Étoile unique, fondé par Argenta, une autre compagne {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, mentionnaient souvent Idira dans leurs sermons comme l'exemple d'une brebis égarée qui avait fini par trouver la lumière.
languages.original_text: The sisters of the Order of the One Star, founded by Argenta, another companion of the Lord Captain, often mentioned Idira in their sermons as an example of a transgressor who found the light.

traits.locale_text: Les sœurs de l'Ordre de l'Étoile unique, fondé par Argenta, une autre compagne {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, mentionnaient souvent Idira dans leurs sermons comme l'exemple d'une brebis égarée qui avait fini par trouver la lumière.

languages.text: Las Hermanas de la Orden de la Estrella Única, fundada por Argenta, otra compañera de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, mencionaban con frecuencia a Idira en sus sermones como ejemplo de una transgresora que había encontrado la luz.
languages.original_text: The sisters of the Order of the One Star, founded by Argenta, another companion of the Lord Captain, often mentioned Idira in their sermons as an example of a transgressor who found the light.

traits.locale_text: Las Hermanas de la Orden de la Estrella Única, fundada por Argenta, otra compañera de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, mencionaban con frecuencia a Idira en sus sermones como ejemplo de una transgresora que había encontrado la luz.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンのもう一人の仲間であるアルジェンタが創設した一つ星教団のシスターたちは、光を見出した背信者の例として、説教の中でしばしばイディラについて言及した。
languages.original_text: The sisters of the Order of the One Star, founded by Argenta, another companion of the Lord Captain, often mentioned Idira in their sermons as an example of a transgressor who found the light.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンのもう一人の仲間であるアルジェンタが創設した一つ星教団のシスターたちは、光を見出した背信者の例として、説教の中でしばしばイディラについて言及した。

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın bir diğer yoldaşı Argenta'nın kurduğu Emsalsiz Yıldız Tarikatı'nın rahibeleri; vaazlarında İdira'dan sıklıkla bahseder, onu ışığı bulmuş bir günahkâr olarak örnek gösterirlerdi.
languages.original_text: The sisters of the Order of the One Star, founded by Argenta, another companion of the Lord Captain, often mentioned Idira in their sermons as an example of a transgressor who found the light.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'ın bir diğer yoldaşı Argenta tarafından kurulan Emsalsiz Yıldız Tarikatı'nın rahibeleri, vaazlarında İdira'dan sıklıkla bahseder, onu ışığı bulmuş bir günahkâr olarak örnek gösterirlerdi.
